disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Bop 'n' Block.

blurb.value: Every so often, Yuumi's next attack against an opponent restores mana and generates a shield. If Yuumi is Attached, the shield protects her ally. The shield protects Yuumi or her ally until it's broken.

description.value: Innate: Periodically, Yuumi's next basic attack against an enemy champion becomes unstoppable, gains  50 bonus range and becomes a non-projectile. This attack restores 25 − 100 (based on level) (+ 8% maximum mana)  mana and grants her a 60 − 400 (based on level) (+ 30% AP) shield that lasts until it is broken.

description2.value: While attached, the shield transfers to her Anchor.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * This ability will apply to a basic attack already in flight, but will not augment it into a non-projectile. Bop 'n' Block will not proc if the attack is dodged or Yuumi misses the attack while blinded. It will proc even if the attack is blocked. Although the shield doesn't expire, it will never stack with itself. Considering Yuumi's base mana, Bop 'n' Block's mana restore is increased by at least 32 − 93.2 (based on level).
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Prowling Projectile.

description.value: Active: Yuumi fires an errant missile in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit.

description2.value: If the missile is in flight for 1 second, it deals increased magic damage, and slows enemy champions struck by 20% for 1 second.

leveling2.value: Empowered Damage:45 / 85 / 125 / 165 / 205 / 245 (+ 40% AP) (+ 2 / 3.2 / 4.4 / 5.6 / 6.8 / 8% of the target's current health)

description3.value: While attached, Yuumi instead directs the trajectory of the missile using the cursor for up to 2 seconds before fizzling, during which she and the Anchor can see the effective range. This cannot be done while channeling Final Chapter.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Prowling Projectile can be buffered 0.5 seconds before it comes off cooldown.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from You and Me!.

description.value: Passive: The Anchor gains either a flat and percentage amount of their  bonus attack damage or a flat and percentage amount of their  ability power, based on whichever was initially higher. The percentage bonus of You and Me! also benefits of its flat bonus.

description2.value: Yuumi then gains flat adaptive force plus an amount based on a percentage of the Anchor's current bonus attack damage or ability power, whichever is higher. Additionally, Yuumi starts with a point in You and Me! and Prowling Projectile instead has 6 ranks.

leveling2.value:
Adaptive Force:12 / 14 / 16 / 18 / 20
Adaptive Force per 100 bonus AD:20 / 23.33 / 26.67 / 30 / 33.33
Adaptive Force per 100 AP:12 / 14 / 16 / 18 / 20

description3.value: Active: After a 0.25-second channel, Yuumi dashes to the target allied champion and attaches to them. This dash is interrupted by immobilizing effects. While attached, Yuumi follows her Anchor's movement, is untargetable (except from turrets and in-flight projectiles targeting her), and casts her spells from the Anchor's position. The cooldown starts ticking down upon completing the channel. You and Me! can be recast after 0.5 seconds of the attachment.

description4.value: Recast: Yuumi can switch her Anchor at no cooldown, and will detach automatically if her Anchor dies or under certain circumstances. If recast without a valid target, Yuumi will detach from her Anchor and dash 250 units in the target direction, putting the ability on cooldown.

description5.value: You and Me! is placed on a 5-second cooldown if Yuumi is immobilized or grounded.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * The ability name for the recast is Change of Plan. You and Me! does not count as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as Spellblade, charging Spellbinder, and stacking Force Pulse. Kassadin cannot gain a stack for Force Pulse while Yuumi is untargetable. Yuumi can channel the Eye of the Herald while attached. The ability power multiplier is additive with other ability power multipliers, like from Rabadon's Deathcap or Infernal Might. The bonus attack damage multiplier is additive with other sources of bonus attack damage multipliers, like from Unseen Predator and is multiplicative with total attack damage multipliers, like from Whisper or Infernal Might. Yuumi will automatically detach in the following circumstances: When her Anchor starts a Teleport channel. After the Anchor completes a Recall channel. Entering resurrection. Her Anchor is sent to the Realm of Death. She is pulled by Fate's Call. The dash has a maximum following range. If her target is too far away before the attachment, the dash is interrupted and You and Me! goes on cooldown. While attached to the Anchor, Yuumi is considered in being at her Anchor's position, regardless of where she is visually placed near them. For example, turret shots will appear as if they were hitting the Anchor, but in reality they're actually hitting Yuumi. Her monster aggression transfers to the Anchor. Enemies gain an assist on Yuumi if they damaged the Anchor. Yuumi gains assists on champion takedowns from her Anchor. Yuumi will also become stealthed if her Anchor does, and can cast her own abilities without breaking the stealth. If Yuumi is on the blue team, she will remain attached on the southwest side; if Yuumi is on the red team, she will remain on the northeast. While channeling Final Chapter, she will be behind her Anchor. Yuumi can dash to targetable zombie state allies (currently only Sion's Glory in Death), but she cannot stay attached for long. Yuumi doesn't detach instantly when her Anchor dies. There's a small grace period in which she can recast You and Me! to attach to another champion without the channel. The player's screen will briefly flash red if Yuumi is affected by a immobilizing or grounding effect, or if she forcibly detaches from her Anchor. The Anchor's health bar will have a different frame to indicate the attached status: The following table refers for interactions while Yuumi is channeling: Type Channel Attacking Disabled Abilities Disabled Movement Disabled Items Usable Shurelya's Reverie Righteous Glory Youmuu's Ghostblade Spellbinder Gargoyle Stoneplate Randuin's Omen Seraph's Embrace Disabled All the other item-actives are disabled Interrupted by N/A Consumables Usable Spells Usable Barrier Clarity Cleanse Exhaust Ghost Heal Ignite Smite Disabled Flash Teleport Recall Hexflash Interrupted by N/A Interrupted by Death Grounding effects Immobilizing effects Silencing effects The following table refers for interactions while Yuumi is attached: Attacking Disabled Abilities Allowed Movement Disabled Items Usable All the other item-actives are usable Disabled Hextech Protobelt-01 Interrupted by N/A Consumables Usable Spells Usable Barrier Clarity Cleanse Exhaust Ghost Heal Ignite Smite Disabled Flash Teleport Recall Hexflash Interrupted by N/A Interrupted by Death

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Zoomies.

description.value: Active: Yuumi heals herself and gains 15% (+ 10% per 100 AP)  bonus movement speed and  bonus attack speed for 3 seconds.

description2.value: While attached, the Anchor is affected by the ability instead.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Final Chapter.

description.value: Active: Yuumi and Book channel for 3.5 seconds, launching 7 waves in the target direction over the duration each dealing magic damage. Enemy champions hit take only 50% damage from subsequent waves, and when struck with three waves, they are rooted for 1.75 seconds, this can only occur once per target.

leveling.value: Magic Damage Per Wave:»60 / 70 / 80 / 90 / 100 (+ 20% AP)«Reduced Damage Per Wave:»30 / 35 / 40 / 45 / 50 (+ 10% AP)«Maximum Champion Damage:»240 / 280 / 320 / 360 / 400 (+ 80% AP)«Maximum Non-Champion Damage:420 / 490 / 560 / 630 / 700 (+ 140% AP)

notes.value: * While attached, Cloud Dragon Soul will not activate until Yuumi detaches. Spell shield will only block a single instance of damage. Yuumi's facing direction during the channel is considered to be in Final Chapter's target direction. Using Hexflash during the channel will always cause Yuumi to blink in the target direction of Final Chapter.* The following table refers for interactions while Yuumi is channeling: Type Channel Attacking Disabled Abilities Prowling Projectile is disabled. You and Me! and Zoomies are usable. Movement Allowed Items Usable All the other item-actives are usable Disabled Hextech Protobelt-01 Interrupted by N/A Consumables Usable Spells Usable Barrier Clarity Cleanse Exhaust Ghost Heal Ignite Smite Flash Teleport Hexflash Mark Dash Disabled Recall Interrupted by N/A Interrupted by Death Silencing effects
